PulpCore

Uses of Class
pulpcore.image.CoreImage

Packages that use CoreImage
pulpcore Provides basic classes necessary for PulpCore apps, including input, asset management, and scene management. 
pulpcore.image Provides classes for images, fonts, and graphic rendering. 
pulpcore.image.filter Provides classes for image filters. 
pulpcore.sprite Provides the Sprite class, the ImageSprite class, and a few Sprite-based widgets. 
 

Uses of CoreImage in pulpcore
 

Methods in pulpcore that return CoreImage
static CoreImage Stage.getScreenshot()
          Gets a screenshot of the current appearance of the stage.
 

Methods in pulpcore with parameters of type CoreImage
static void Stage.getScreenshot(CoreImage image, int x, int y)
          Gets a screenshot at the specified location on the screen and copies it to the specified image.

Subclasses of CoreImage in pulpcore.image
 class AnimatedImage
          An AnimatedImage is a CoreImage that contains multiple frames of animation.
